name: Friends: "Comes in all shapes and colors!"
name_original: Friends: "Comes in all shapes and colors!"
description:
Made in 48 hours During the GMTK Game Jam 2021

Theme: Joined together

Get friends, battle enemies, and save the world in this cute survival 2D metroidvania like game, with multiple different friends to rescue, all with different abilities! 

Join your friends together on an epic quest to rid the world of a dangerous evil! 

This game does not require actual friends to play, you will get those in game!
